T02D2464:140b-1: bi shuddha darsha na tsarya au pa de sha n'a ma /
T02D2464:140b-3: lta spyod rnam dag gi man ngag ces bya ba /
T02D2464:140b-4: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2464:140b-5: rmi lam lta bur phyi rol min //
T02D2464:140b-6: sgyu ma lta bur bden don med //
T02D2464:140b-7: nam mkha' lta bur mtshan nyid bral //
T02D2464:140b-8: chos kun rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'o //
T02D2464:140b-10: rgya chen sems can don la mkhas //
T02D2464:140b-11: tshogs gnyis dbyer med lam gyi mchog / stong nyid snying rje'i snying po bsgom //
T02D2464:140b-12: lta spyod rnam dag gi man ngag ces bya ba
T02D2464:140b-13: kha che'i rigs kyi pandi ta chen po dpal chos
T02D2464:140b-14: kyi sh'akya shr'i bha dra'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa
T02D2464:140b-16: / mkhas pa chen po de nyid kyi spyan sngar
T02D2464:140b-17: lo ts'a ba byams pa'i dpal gyis khro phu bzang
